Metadata.title: Nomena R. | Web Developer
Metadata.description: Experienced Web developer from Madagascar. Symfony, React, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript and more...

projects.eazylangMarketplaceDesc:
Contributor and website maintainer for Eazylang Marketplace.
Eazylang marketplace is a platform that brings together translation professionals and their customers.
projects.eazylangWorkplaceDesc:
Contribution to the development and deployment of web services which constitute the Eazylang Workplace platform.
Eazylang Workplace enables translation professionals to set up their own translation agency.
projects.evisaMadagascarDesc: Contributor and maintainer of the official electronic visa issuer website for Madagascar.

hero.experience: I build web apps for {years} years now.

timeline.masterDegreeTitle: Master's Degree in Telecommunications at Polytechnic School of Antananarivo
timeline.cs50Title: CS50's Mobile App Development with React Native at EDX.org
timeline.cs50Desc: Funded by African App Launchpad and the Malagasy Ministry of Digital Transformation, Posts and Telecommunications.
timeline.geckoDesc: As part of the development team, I've been in charge of development and deployments.
timeline.dirisDesc: In close collaboration with the project manager, my role was focused on the development of APIs on Symfony and frontend applications on React.
timeline.eazylangTitle: Web Developer at EAZYLANG TECHNOLOGIES - Remote
timeline.eazylangDesc: I was responsible for developing new features and maintaining existing apps. I also contributed to the migration of certain apps to Amazon EKS and the implementation of Continuous Integration and Delivery.
